about_the_game:
The original soundtrack for Mega Man ZX has been remastered, complete with 32 tracks!
*Includes art by official illustrator Makoto Yabe!

The 75+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
